Title: Waltz with Bashir
Overview: An Israeli film director interviews fellow veterans of the 1982 invasion of Lebanon to reconstruct his own memories of his term of service in that conflict.
production_companies: Les Films d'Ici, Bridgit Folman Film Gang, Razor Film Produktion
Cast: Ari Folman, Ron Ben-Yishai, Dror Harazi
